short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocking posts with ads on facebook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say goodbye to Facebook ads. "Ads blocker for FaceBook" is a simple ad blocker to block Facebook.com sponsored, suggested posts (ads) and video ads, It works for all FB available languages and also for Mobile website.
